CustomField.formula: ROUND(24*( (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Exit_Time__c)-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(Exit_Time__c) -DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, (MOD(Exit_Time__c -DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 05:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(NULLVALUE(Enter_Time__c, CreatedDate))-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(NULLVALUE(Enter_Time__c, CreatedDate))-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, (MOD(NULLVALUE(Enter_Time__c, CreatedDate)-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 05:00:00'), 1))) )) ), 2)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Show the number of hours elapsed between the Enter Time and Start Time, excluding weekends, based on a 24 hr workday. Used for testing to confirm the time to update the formula in a lightning process called Status Tracking Time Elapsed.
CustomField.label: Time Elapsed Hours (24 hr Day) (formula)
